statements: DELETE FROM donation_receipts WHERE donation_amount > 500 AND acknowledgement_sent = TRUE;
DELETE FROM donation_receipts WHERE donor_id = 100 AND donation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM donation_receipts WHERE donation_amount >= 5000 AND acknowledgement_sent = FALSE;
DELETE FROM receipts WHERE receipt_id = 100 AND acknowledgment_sent = false;
DELETE FROM Donor WHERE donor_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Donation WHERE donation_amount > 5000 AND donation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Donor WHERE donor_email LIKE '%@example.com';
